channel.title: Priest survived res with merc
channel.description:
#### What happened? Priest claimed to have been attacked (at least to us in dead chat), mentioned he had a merc that was not on duty the night he was attacked. Later in the game he revived prince, and survived.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Priest should have died during the revive.
#### Steps to reproduce: I'd assume be prince, get atacked, revive while being guarded by a merc.
#### Comments:

item.title: Priest survived res with merc
item.dc:creator: CN73DRUMMER
item.description:
Even if it is a bug, I like that that happened. What are the odds the priest gets a merc? If he does get a merc, that’d be an awesome combo to use, Wish it was supposed to be that way.

Read full topic

item.title: Priest survived res with merc
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
He said that his immunity was punctured (IE the first attack was not healed or protected from), When he revived he was saved by a merc. At least according to what he said in game.

The death by reviving is supposed to be unstoppable.

Read full topic

What happened?

Priest claimed to have been attacked (at least to us in dead chat), mentioned he had a merc that was not on duty the night he was attacked. Later in the game he revived prince, and survived.
